dc_title_s: Map of the United States of North America with parts of the adjacent countries
dc_description_s: Map of the continental United States showing relief by hachures, drainage, state boundaries, cities and towns, roads, trails, canals, and railroads.|From his The American Atlas (London, J. Arrowsmith, 1839); Description derived from published bibliography.|91 x 124 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:4,000,000.|General Map Collection
